decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly deploying low-cost creatures and controlling the board with counterspells and removal spells. By efficiently countering opponent's spells and removing their threats, the deck aims to maintain board presence and chip away at the opponent's life total with agile creatures like Delver of Secrets and Ninja of the Deep Hours. The inclusion of cantrips like Ponder and Preordain help to filter through the deck and set up advantageous draws, while cards like Faerie Seer and Spellstutter Sprite provide additional disruption. Mystic Sanctuary ensures recurring powerful spells for added value.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through the use of card draw, counterspells, and removal spells. The key strategy is to utilize cards like Ghostly Flicker and Ephemerate to generate value from enter the battlefield effects on creatures like Mulldrifter and Sea Gate Oracle. By setting up a strong defense with cards like Sunscape Familiar and God-Pharaoh's Faithful, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and grind out a win through card advantage and synergy. The mana base is also designed to support consistent casting of spells throughout the game.

This Aggro - Affinity deck focuses on maximizing artifact synergy to overwhelm opponents with early aggression. By utilizing cards like Myr Enforcer, Carapace Forger, and Atog alongside artifact lands and mana fixing cards, the deck aims to quickly amass a board presence and deal damage efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Galvanic Blast and Fling provide the deck with both removal and reach to close out games. Additionally, card draw spells like Thoughtcast and Prophetic Prism help ensure the deck maintains momentum throughout the game.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly apply pressure on the opponent while efficiently disrupting their game plan. By using low-cost spells and creatures, it aims to control the board and counter threats that may arise. The combination of cheap removal spells, counterspells, and card draw ensures that the deck can adapt to different situations and maintain tempo advantage. Gurmag Angler serves as a powerful finisher, while Delver of Secrets and Augur of Bolas provide early pressure and card advantage. Mystic Sanctuary allows for recursion of key spells, enhancing the deck's overall consistency.

This Mono Black Aggro deck focuses on a high level of aggression and disruption, utilizing efficient removal spells like Defile and Victim of Night to control the board while deploying threats like Gray Merchant of Asphodel and Cuombajj Witches to quickly close out the game. The inclusion of card draw spells like Sign in Blood and Thorn of the Black Rose helps to maintain card advantage, while disruptive cards like Chittering Rats and Duress disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a mix of efficient creatures and disruptive spells.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the board with Elf creatures, utilizing cards like Priest of Titania and Elvish Vanguard to ramp up mana production and aggression. Lead the Stampede and Distant Melody are used to refill the hand with more Elves, while Timberwatch Elf and Lys Alana Huntmaster provide powerful buffs and token generation. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of Elves, utilizing their synergy and tapping abilities to maximize damage output and secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this deck is to create a fast and powerful aggro deck by utilizing auras to buff up creatures like Slippery Bogle, Silhana Ledgewalker, and Gladecover Scout. By enchanting these creatures with cards like Ethereal Armor, Armadillo Cloak, and Ancestral Mask, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with high power and toughness creatures early in the game. The inclusion of cards like Utopia Sprawl and Abundant Growth also helps with mana ramp and fixing, ensuring a smooth and efficient playstyle.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and direct damage spells, focusing on quick and efficient plays. By utilizing low-cost creatures like Valley Dasher, Mogg Conscripts, and Goblin Cohort, along with pump effects from cards like Goblin Bushwhacker and Foundry Street Denizen, the goal is to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The deck also includes direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning, along with sacrificial spells like Fireblast and Goblin Grenade to finish off opponents as needed.

The main focus of the deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using cheap burn spells and aggressive creatures. By efficiently using cards like Rift Bolt, Lava Spike, and Chain Lightning, the deck aims to reduce the opponent's life total as fast as possible. The inclusion of cards like Thermo-Alchemist and Ghitu Lavarunner helps to maintain pressure on the opponent while also providing additional damage output. Searing Blaze, Needle Drop, and Lightning Bolt offer versatile removal options, while Fireblast and Skewer the Critics can be crucial finishers.

The main focus of this Boros Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence with efficient creatures such as Seeker of the Way and Squadron Hawk, backed up by removal spells like Journey to Nowhere and Lightning Bolt. Faithless Looting helps filter through the deck for key cards, while Battle Screech and Rally the Peasants provide additional damage and combat tricks. The deck aims to apply consistent pressure on the opponent and close out games swiftly with a mix of creatures and burn spells.

This deck focuses on generating a lot of mana with the Urza lands (Tower, Power Plant, Mine) to cast powerful spells and control the board. It includes card draw, counter spells, flicker effects, and ways to recur spells from the graveyard. The win condition is to stall the game using cards like Stonehorn Dignitary and eventually overwhelm the opponent with card advantage and powerful creatures like Mulldrifter and Dinrova Horror. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent and control the game until it can secure a win.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game early on with counterspells and removal, while also deploying aggressive threats like Delver of Secrets and Gurmag Angler to quickly close out the game. The deck utilizes efficient removal spells like Snuff Out and Agony Warp to keep opposing creatures at bay, while also leveraging card draw and filtering through spells like Brainstorm and Preordain to maintain card advantage. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Mystic Sanctuary and Tragic Lesson allows for potential late-game value and recursion.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using burn spells and aggressive creatures with cards like Curse of the Pierced Heart, Searing Blaze, Needle Drop, Lightning Bolt, and Fireblast. By utilizing efficient creatures like Thermo-Alchemist and Ghitu Lavarunner, along with direct damage spells like Rift Bolt, Lava Spike, and Chain Lightning, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast and consistent damage, ultimately winning the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The deck focuses on utilizing a wide range of sliver creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent through aggressive plays. By consistently playing multiple sliver creatures each turn, the deck aims to build a powerful board presence and put pressure on the opponent early in the game. The inclusion of cards like Lead the Stampede and Winding Way help to refill the hand with more slivers, ensuring a continuous stream of threats. Overall, the deck's strategy revolves around swarming the battlefield with slivers and outpacing the opponent with efficient creature-based aggression.
